title: Occasionally, the screen appears black on the lobby.
body: It's only the lobby which is black. The rest of the client is fine. I got a 5 minute wait for this which sucks, but oh well. I've had it happen to friends as well.

replies.body:
Hey there,

How often are you experiencing this issue?
It's rare and not often. I can remember it happening twice over the periods of maybe 3 months?

Sounds to me like an intermittent issue with your connection, more than likely nothing can be done to help this.

Are you using wireless? I recommend switching to a wired connection whenever possible.

I don't think it's an issue my internet. I use cable internet. The lobby screen popped up for a moment and then disappeared. It's definitely an issue to do with displaying the lobby screen. I could chat with people just fine on the client. If I'm really getting notable lag, there's a delay on my messages. I can assure you, it's not connection, but an issue with displaying/rendering the lobby screen for whatever reason.
